templates.name: Variables

# Variables Example
name = "Python"

templates.name: Loop
Function
templates.code:
# Function Example
def greet(name):
    return f"Hello, {name}!"

print(greet("Python Developer"))

templates.name: List Comprehension
templates.code:
# List Comprehension Example
squares = [x**2 for x in range(10)]
print(squares)
